overview: Welcome to the future, where sex clubs are illegal, strip clubs are closed and the only place to see depravity is at the circus...namely the B. Skow Big Top! And in the center ring...Lanny Barbie, the sultriest new superstar in her first ever DP...surrounded by five anals, six facials, a gang bang and one wild, crazy squirter. We said this was a circus, didn't we?
tagline: There's No Bearded Lady, But There's Plenty of Shaved Ones
title: Circus
